readme: # Atom-Asana Note: Package is in initial stage View your asana projects & their tasks inside your Atom. Demo: ![How to use](https://media.giphy.com/media/3pZcBj57xIfg8R3ASo/giphy.gif) Setup: * Get your [Asana api key](https://asana.com/guide/help/api/api#gl-connect) Package provide following functionality: * View Asana Projects * View Project Tasks * Mark Tasks as Complete/Incomplete * Filter Complete/Incomplete Tasks * Refresh Tasks (Auto-refresh will be provided in future) Following functionalities are under development. * Add Project * Paginate Tasks * Display/Add Sections * Add Task * Task related informations * Description * Due date * Tags * Auto refresh view * Error Handling. * Replace Api token with OAuth * Decent UI :P Please feel free to contribute. ### Donate: * [Buy me a coffee](http://ko-fi.com/A734L98)
